main.description: Computer expert, always learning something new. Great on the phone and in person. I love helping people and solving problems. I take pride in being detail oriented and a fast learner.

work.title: IT Technician
work.description: Managing a stream of incoming calls and support tickets from internal clients. Troubleshooting business systems, networks, cloud services, drivers, and hardware. Deploying and maintaining Windows 10 images for new computers. Modifying security groups and users in Active Directory and Azure. Configuring Citrix, Cisco VPN, and Cisco Unity Call Manager. Advising team members on best practices for security and maintenance.

work.title: Field Technician
work.description: On-site IT for HCPHS mass vaccination sites and BDU clinics. Responsible for network deployment & device upkeep for data entry and medical staff. Access to vaccination database through Power BI and SharePoint to verify clients against previous records. Ensuring compliance with health and safety standards for clients and other teammembers.

work.title: Car Sales
work.description: Understanding clients and their relationship to the product to close sales and overcome objections. Enhancing the dealerâ€™s reputation by keeping an excellent personal brand and a reputable online presence. Acting as a subject matter expert on the automotive industry to help the client make an intelligent purchase.

work.title: IT Consultant
work.description: Building and repairing computer systems for private and small business clients. Assisting with setup and configuration of consumer  electronics.

abs.desc: Proficient in troubleshooting a broad range of software across multiple operating systems (iOS, Android, Windows,  MacOS). Capable of system level hardware repair on computers and other IT devices.  Aware of current and upcoming trends in technology and business.

I wield an arsenal of interpersonal skills that allow me to build trust and commitment between clients, team  members, and businesses. I am fluent in English and Spanish. I am comfortable speaking with strangers, and I enjoy making friends.
Familiar with computer science fundamentals and programming in Python and JavaScript. Capable of learning new libraries and frameworks quickly. Some SQL experience and database design.
